remarks: The property of being a refinement of a cover.  Dr.  Nyikos once commented in class that the term "refinement" is actually misleading and that people are inclined to confuse it with the notion defined in ~ isfne .  On the other hand, the two concepts do seem to have a dual relationship.  (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 18-Jan-2010.)  (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 3-Feb-2020.)
statement:
isref.1 $e |- X = U. A $.
isref.2 $e |- Y = U. B $.
isref $p |- ( A e. C -> ( A Ref B <-> ( Y = X /\ A. x e. A E. y e. B x C_ y ) ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x y $.
